Contradict fact: The claim that Donald Trump posted a message on Twitter stating that Nickelback would play at his inauguration contradicts the fact that this tweet was not real and does not appear on his official Twitter account.
Exaggerate: There is an exaggeration in the claim as it presents a false statement as if it were true.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the provided claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters as it presents false information about Donald Trump's tweet.

Problematic assumption: There is no problematic assumption in the claim.
